Yeah... about 100 of these similar polls with similar results already...

The results of this poll will no doubt be the same: Around 80% of people will say game is good or quite good. 15-20% will still claim that game is almost or completely unplayable because of broken wheel/gears/landing legs or frequent crashes.

I think we already know that... no need for a new poll anymore  But hey, whatever floats your boat

@DChurchill but then I'd miss you!

But seriously, I find the results of these polls interesting for their own sakes. I also think they do the community a service, because it gives people a way to say 'I'm having a really shirty time with KSP at the moment' in what at least looks and feels like it's constructive, and I seriously think that's better than an endless stream of rage-threads. Equally it gives the people who think this release is amazing somewhere to express the same thing without having to start scapegoating anybody or complaining about the complainers.

Polls basically tell you how many people out there are sharing the same issues or views as you, and therefore whether you're in a small minority, a big minority, or a majority - this sort of information really helps people understand one another in a way that just reading a post about someone's individual experiences never can. It can help moderate attitudes if you can see that you're one of a very few, or if actually the number of people on the other side of a problem is much bigger than you thought.

But like I've said before, you don't have to get involved at all if polls aren't your thing, or even if you just don't fancy it this time around.

Edit: I know I stuck u up there at the top DChurchill, but this isn't sighted in on you personally

Stop with these polls already. The game is highly unstable for about 15% of people.

I am one of these, and I don't give a flying **** about whether we are 14.95% or 15.05%.

There is already a thread made by Claw which on its own is 100 times more useful than all of these polls combined. 1.1 has been out for a month and a half, so have the crashes/bugs. If the answer was as simple as "lol don't use windoze 10" or that kind of banter (staying polite here) we'd have figured it out long ago.

The game needs to be fixed. Polls don't help in fixing the game, just help in making people angry (see this very post for a demonstration). The End.

 

EDIT: and yes, I am mad.
